attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After being brought up under a Tory Government, I was relieved when Tony Blair came to power.  He has done so much for this country - put it back on its feet.  I have swore that should he ever leave office, I will leave the country.  I couldn't handle another Tory Government, or other Labour Leader.  God Bless Tony Blair!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
